properties.description: Join us for our Warm Welcome Crafternoon Tea every Friday, 1.30pm - 3.30-pm for refreshments, friendly chat and companionship. Bring along a craft or art project, no need to book, just drop-in. We look forward to meeting you. Full range of free library services available during opening hours with a programme of free activities for children and families.

properties.description:
Coffee Morning and Crafternoon Tea

The Library is open every day apart from Tuesday and Sunday for people to visit. Every third Monday of the month at 10am we have a coffee morning and every Friday is crafts at 1:30pm – 3.30pm with free hot drinks and biscuits. Bring your own craft or art project and join us for refreshments and chat. No need to book, just drop-in for a warm welcome Free to attend.
